messages.title: THE TRUTH ABOUT THE EUROPEAN UNION
messages.content: Britain Pays £40 million a day out of our taxes direct to Brussels. They don't tell us that part of this money is paying for Massive Subsidies to French farmers, New motorways in Spain and Greece, a new sewer system in Poland, etc. We are told that we have to pay for Britain's EU membership, but more than 60 non-EU countries have free trade agreements with the EU without these massive costs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Criticizes the money Britain pays to the EU and suggests that trade can be conducted without the costs associated with EU membership.
Calls for controlled Immigration and highlights issues with current asylum seeker preferences.

issues.brexitEurope: Britain Pays £40 million a day out of our taxes direct to Brussels. They don't tell us that part of this money is paying for Massive Subsidies to French farmers, New motorways in Spain and Greece, a new sewer system in Poland, etc. We are told that we have to pay for Britain's EU membership, but more than 60 non-EU countries have free trade agreements with the EU without these massive costs.
issues.governance: For the last 50 years we have seen Labour and Conservative governments at government and at local level bring the country to the verge of bankruptcy with their economic policies.
issues.immigration: On the right side panel, the leaflet features statements about asylum seekers, indicating a policy position on Immigration: '9 out of 10 asylum seekers for Calais (who expressed a preference) prefer the British benefits system.'

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voters, I am South Ribble for you - Not Preston and I have lived in Leyland. I have represented the 7 Stars ward of Leyland Borough Council for 3 Years.

politicalExperience.achievements: Represented the 7 Stars ward of Leyland Borough Council.
